1.content: First of all, how old is this girl going to be?
1.title: Beginning

11.content: How do you want her belly to grow?
11.title: How?

111.content: Isabella woke up for school and went and got dressed. Her parents were out of town this week leaving her all by herself. She put on some black leggings and a blue and red t-shirt. Isabella had black hair and rosey cheeks, plus an adorable smile! She went and ate some cereal before leaving the house.
111.title: Belly inflation

choices: They get an air tank from the gym
Casey hooks a hose up to the water fountain
1111.content:
Isabella went to school. When she got there she met her best friend Casey. "Hi Casey." Isabella said.

"Hi Isabella." Casey said. They talked for a bit before some bullies came up and shoved them around and taking their lunch money. They also made fun of how short Isabella was.

"Grr, stupid bullies." said Isabella. "I wish I was bigger to get back at them.". Casey smirked. "I have an idea." Casey said
1111.title: Go to school

choices: "It feels... weird" (She doesn't really like it)
11111.content:
After school, the girls stood out the back of the gym. Casey had an air tank at the ready, with Isabella holding onto a hose attached to it.
"Are you sure about this," Isabella questioned.
"Of course I am," Casey responded. With that, Isabella popped the hose into her mouth, and Casey turned the valve.

Isabella's cheeks puffed up, as a torrent of air made its way down her throat and into her awaiting stomach. At first the progress didn't show, prompting Casey to turn the valve some more. Isabella's cheeks puffed up further, as her flat tummy started to bulge, lifting up her shirt. Putting a hand to her growing middle, Isabella felt her belly push out from her torso, becoming bigger and rounder by the second. She squeaked out a small moan as her shirt started lifting up, revealing a growing strip of peeking belly.
"Looking great, Izzy," Casey said to her swelling friend.
"Mmm mmph mmrphh mm," Isabella replied, her swollen stomach now the size of a soccer ball. Both hands were on her belly, as she stared in awe at how big it was becoming. Finally, the valve turned off, and Casey walked over to her ballooned buddy. Isabella had lifted her shirt up to her chest so she could get a good view of her bulging belly, softly rubbing the dome. Filled with air, it rivalled a basketball in sheer size! It was tight, but still had some give, and her skin remained mostly soft. It was odd to see such a mass come from her. She had no idea a person could get this large, let alone a little girl like her! Casey placed her hand on it and rubbed slowly.
"Woah..." She softly spoke, blushing. After a brief pause with her rubbing Isabella's tummy and blushing, she asked her bulging bestie, "...How does it feel?"
11111.title: They get an air tank from the gym

choices: She stops and tries something else
11112.content:
"There." Casey said. "The hose is all hooked up". Isabella nodded and began drinking, loud gulping sounds ringing out as she swallowed gallon after gallon. Her belly didn't expand at first, but after a bit it slowly began bulging, her underbelly peeking out.

"It's working!" shouted Casey with glee. This made Isabella drink faster as her stomach gurgled and sloshed, growing to the size of a basketball. "I'll show those bullies whose big!" she thought determinedly.
11112.title: Casey hooks a hose up to the water fountain

choices: Isabella chugs a bunch of soda
Isabella drinks out of the entire ocean
111122.content:
Isabella spat the hose out of her mouth. "Why'd you do that?" Casey asked. "Too slow." replied Isabella. "I want to get big fast."

"Slow down." Casey said. "You don't know what'll happen. You should take it slow". Isabella shook her head. "No. I want to grow HUMONGOUS!"

"How?" Casey asked
111122.title: She stops and tries something else

choices: The bullies come back and shake her
1111221.content:
"Is this a good idea?" Casey asked. "Who cares." replied Isabella, chugging her third 2 liter in a row, patting her sloshy belly. "As long as I get huge."

"I think this is going to your head." said Casey, hearing how Isabella's tummy gurgled loudly. "How's your belly?" she asked. Isabella burped so loud it shook the ground. "Full." she said, drinking a six pack of pepsi.

"You should stop." said Casey. "Your tummy is under a lot of pressure.". "I know" said Isabella. "It's great." she said, only thinking of getting bigger.
1111221.title: Isabella chugs a bunch of soda

choices: Casey tries to make her not inflate
11112212.content:
"Oh no..." said Casey, hiding behind Isabella. "They're back."

The bullies walked over and laughed at Isabella. "Look, shorty turned into fatty!" one of them laughed.

They all picked her up and shook her around violently before toughly throwing her on the ground. Isabella moaned as the pressure rose massively. She let out such a loud burp that it blew the bullies flying backwards!! "Oh, I don't feel so good." she groaned, belly rumbling and gurgling loudly.
11112212.title: The bullies come back and shake her

111122121.content: Her belly suddenly expanded to twice its sise nocking the bullies over.
111122121.title: She explodes out in size

choices: Isabella bloats up to the size of a weather balloon
1111221212.content:
"Oh shit!" one of them yelled, turning around and running away.The second one ran too, but the third quickly got pinned underneath Isabella's growing tummy.

Casey walked out from behind underneath Isabella and looked at the bully, who was squirming underneath Isabellas growing and gurgling belly. "Ugh.." She groaned as the bully begged Casey for help but Casey went behind Isabella, already knowing she wasn't done growing...
1111221212.title: the bullies run off scared.

choices: Casey suddenly tries to shove her tummy back in
111122122.content:
"Oh no!" Casey said, walking over to Isabella. Isabella was groaning and squirming as her face turned red, belly threatening to expand to huge sizes. "Don't inflate!" Casey said.


"I-I'm trying not to!" Isabella said, burping loud enough to shake the whole school, the pressure increasing tenfold. "I-I can't stop it!" she yelled, feeling it rumble violently in her hands as she clutched the sizes of her tummy.

Suddenly her stomach felt cold, and Casey was nervously rubbing her tummy. "Please don't inflate." she said. "We don't know what will happen if you do."
111122122.title: Casey tries to make her not inflate

1111222.content:
"Are you sure this is a good idea?" Casey asked nervously, tossing the hose into the ocean after her and Isabella walked to a dock.

"As long as I grow huge." Isabella said slurping out of the hose end that wasn't in the water. .
1111222.title: Isabella drinks out of the entire ocean

choices: She grows too fast and pops
11112221.content:
"Woah!!" Casey shouted jumping back in shock as Isabella's bloated gut swelled out rapidly as the 10 year old drank a huge gulp of water, her tummy sloshing as it grew to the size of a small car. "You grew fast!" Casey shouted.

"Watch this!" Isabella yelled and slurped even harder...
11112221.title: She gets huge fast

111122212.content:
Isabella drank and sucked, her belly swiftly doubling then tripling as she got bigger and bigger and huger and rounder. "You're doing so well!" Casey said, causing Isabella to drink more to the size of a semi now laying on her own belly as Casey prodded her.

As Casey kept poking however Isabella had more and more trouble drinking as her tummy started creaking..."isabella?" Casey asked nervously as her friends growth slowed, but still she kept drinking. "Maybe stop before you pop?"

Her pleading fell on deaf ears as Isabella kept drinking however, now almost as big as a small house. But the creaking was super loud now as stretch marks appear. "Isabella, you're gonna blow!!!"

Isabella moaned in pain as she grew wider, nearly above the trees as she clutched her swollen gut feeling ready to burst at any moment as more and more water filled her tightly packed stomach. But she was so determined to show those bullies who they were messing with she drank more anyway...

"Isabella!!" Casey screamed. "Stop or you'll explode!!!" she yelled as Isabella's bright red tummy rumbled and creaked violently, too much pressure building up as she was now the size of a hot air balloon, approaching the size of a blimp...
111122212.title: She grows too fast and pops

choices: She gets force-fed by someone she knows.
112.content: Samantha was a nice cute 10-year-old girl with long red hair and a big appetite. Soon that appetite was going to show on her figure but first how exactly does she start getting stuffed?
112.title: Belly stuffing

1123.content:
"Sam!" the call of her name was the precursor to how this all started. The call came from her dad Ben who she was staying with for a few months. She had preferred this over staying with her mom, for it was her dad that gave in a enabler to her large appetite. Then it was the smells coming up from the kitchen to gently kiss her smell receptors and drag her willingly down stairs to what would be the greatest sites she thought she would ever see, her dad standing there with an apron tied around his waist and shirtless to expose his glistening abs, and almost a thanks giving's day feast of a breakfast. "It's breakfast..." He trailed of as he turned around noticing that she was already there before he could realize that she even heard him call her.

"Morning dad!" Samantha replied hungerly and excitedly as she was sizing up the feast that laid in front of her. All the wile her dad was sizing her up, realizing that his little girl wasn't so little anymore. In fact she was developing some amazingly motherly features, he could tell because in her haste to make it down stairs she barely covered herself with a tee-shirt. "Breakfast looks, and smells amazing as per usual,"


"Yeah?" He stood there going over her soft curves letting his brain get a good picture of her widening motherly hips, her soft little paunch of a belly from all the stuffings she does, not that it's to noticeable yet but it's starting, her budding breasts which were noticeable on her small 4'9" frame, and then her beautiful face with the smile that could melt the hardest ice and the eyes that could disarm whole armies; then there was her hair, it was long like her mothers, long and red like a wild fire. It was just long enough not to seem creepy but long enough to get a fantastic look at his half dressed daughter before she could ask if they could eat.


"Is all of this for me?" she asked only half joking, the meal it's self look like it was big enough to feed a family of five and still maybe have some for a 6th member but she saw her self possibly eating all of it herself

"Maybe, if you think you can handle all of that," He replied with a fatherly smirk "My little disposal." she then made sounds mimicking a garbage disposal, which made them both giggle.

"Or if you would like you could have some," she looked at him with her big eyes "or maybe even feed me!" she ended with an excited shout...


Where will this story go!
1123.title: Something else.

11232.content:
"Open wide!", "OMG, Dad, this is really good!" said Samantha, "Well, if it's good. You should eat on your own." her Dad relied like talking to a 4 years old, "Aw, fine then. I suppose." "I'll just do it by my self.", a "We will rock you" ringtone sounded. "Um, Samantha?" asked her father. "Yes Dad?" "I need to go and take care of work, and go to the shower, brush your teeth after you are done with your breakfast, ok?" "Ok, Dad". after her Dad's gone up stairs, to take care of work, Samantha began.

First, she took out the bacon area, which ended pretty fast in her stomach, then afterwards she ate the toasts, gulped down all the milk, finished what's mostly left, now Samantha had a belly that looked like 9 months pregnant, (considering the fact of she drank lots of milk) she hurried up stairs, deciding whether or not should she rest before going to the bathroom.
11232.title: He feeds her

113.content:
Little Sammy is a 10 year old little girl who've just about to start in a new school.
She herself is on the rather short end, even for her age: the girl only standing at 4'4" tall. Though she is a girl with some big ambitions: as she'd discovered something quite wonderful the day before while browsing the web and talking to her friends.
On a forum, she got linked a video showing off a girl swallowing another woman whole. Sammy was mesmerized at the sight, seeing how the woman's stomach got absolutely massive from having a girl inside her.

Sammy wanted to see if she could do the same, she wanted a gut as big as the woman, maybe even bigger if she could.
She started small, seeing if she could even swallow something whole as she brought an apple to her mouth and opened wide and stuffed it inside. The red fruit plunged down without any issue at all, as her throat bulged out from the apple making its way down to her stomach before eventually resting in her gut.

"Amazing, I can totally do it!" She screamed out in pure joy. Jumping where she stood from the excitement.
But who would she test her ability out on though? She did still have some time before school was about to start and she wanted to show her classmates her distended stomach after all.
113.title: Vore

152.content: Who's helping this little girl feed her belly to massive purportions?
152.title: Belly stuffing

choices: Mary is sleepwalking and eating a ton of extra food
154.content:
No one was quite sure at first what had happened. Little Mary had been sick for a few weeks, throwing up every morning and with a gradually-swelling tummy. Her worried parents took her to doctor after doctor, terrified that she had a tumor of some kind. Finally they were referred to, of all things, a gynecologist. She took various samples from Mary and returned to her parents with some shocking news----they were going to be grandparents! Barely three years old, Mary was going to be the youngest mother on record. She didn't seem to understand much about what was happening to her, though eventually her father was able to extract from her the fact that her older brother's friend had pulled her big-girl underwear down and 'peed white stuff' all over her little girl vulva. An internal examination revealed that Mary had probably begun menstruating at around a year old---she was now as fertile as she would ever be, and thus those wayward sperm had 'caught' inside her. (Her brother's friend mysteriously disappeared shortly after this came to light, as did her father's old hunting rifle. The rifle was eventually returned to its place in the shed, minus one shell.)

Unfortunately, the doctor told them, Mary was too small to safely perform an abortion. Her organs were still growing; attempts to remove the fetus could cause permanent damage or even a fatal injury. The safest thing would be to allow her to give birth naturally, and then either put the child up for adoption or raise it as her sibling. For Mary's part, once the 'tummy-yuckies'---her term for morning sickness---passed she seemed to quite enjoy being pregnant. She'd frequently roll her shirt up to reveal her bump, and liked to have her friends at daycare feel the baby in her belly. Her parents soon realized, however, that her bump was growing faster than should have been expected and seemed larger than normal for as far along as she was. Back to the doctor they went. It was eventually revealed that:
154.title: Baby's having a baby!

1541.content: Ok, but just how many?
1541.title: There are multiple babies!

info.brief_description: Somewhere in the world a little girl wants a big belly, How does she get one? You decide.
info.description:
-Girls can't be any older then 10 or an younger then 3
-Any form of belly inflation is allowed
-Futa is allowed, But not recommended.
-Forced belly inflation and force-feeding is allowed
-No killing of the characters
-Vore/analvore and unbirth is allowed
-Sex and porn is allowed
-Yuri is allowed
-Pregnancy is allowed
-Burping and stomach noises are allowed, just no farting
-The belly is the only part that is allowed to gain weight
-No male weight gain or inflation of any kind
-Belly bursting is allowed, Just as long as it isn't gory and the character survives
-Water sports, Foot fetish, Dippers, Transformation, Etc. Are all big no no's
-Furry is allowed
-Cum inflation is allowed
-Belly's can be as big as you want, EVEN UNIVERSE SIZED!!!
-And Lastly. Original Characters only
